attributes.action: make all printed business directories 'opt in' rather than 'opt out'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each year millions of printed business directories (e.g Yellow Pages, Thomson Local) go to waste at huge environmental cost. The current system of 'opting out' is insufficient and should instead by changed to one that is 'opt in' to ensure that only the people that want them to receive them.
